trans-unit.target: 开发人员已添加这些控件后，目录模式变得页上受支持的显示模式，因为所需的控件有若要启用目录的模式。

trans-unit.source: When a user switches a page to catalog mode, the zone and all the server controls that were added to it become visible, and the user can select controls from the catalog to add to the page, or remove controls from the page.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将某页目录模式、 区域和已添加到变得可见，它的所有服务器控件切换和用户可以从要添加到页中，或从页中删除控件的目录中选择控件。

trans-unit.source: After the controls have been added to the page, they appear in normal browse mode and the page is updated.
trans-unit.target: 控件已添加到页后，会显示在普通浏览模式中，更新页。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> field programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>字段以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes for the page, which in this case are browse, design, and catalog.
trans-unit.target: 此代码填充页上，在这种情况下是浏览、 设计和目录的受支持的显示模式的下拉列表。

trans-unit.source: The catalog mode is available because of the `<asp:CatalogZone>` element and its child elements in the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 由于可以目录模式了`<asp:CatalogZone>`元素及其子元素在 Web 页。

trans-unit.source: Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，，在`Page_PreRender`方法时，代码将检查是否当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>。

trans-unit.source: If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果是这样，`Label1`将是可见的如果不是，`Label1`将隐藏。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default.
trans-unit.target: 加载浏览器中后，您拥有默认情况下浏览模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the label on the page is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，隐藏页上的标签。

trans-unit.source: Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to catalog mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用下拉列表框控件将页切换到目录模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now visible.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于中的代码`Page_PreRender`方法，标签才现在可见。

trans-unit.source: You can select the control in the catalog and add it to either of the two zones on the page.
trans-unit.target: 可以在目录中选择的控件，并将其添加到以下任一页上的两个区域。

trans-unit.source: Checks the capabilities of the browser making the request, and the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableClientScript" /> property, to determine whether to render client script.
trans-unit.target: 检查发出请求的浏览器的功能，并检查 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableClientScript" /> 属性的值，以确定是否呈现客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether to render client script.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示是否呈现客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a warning that is displayed when a user closes a control that is acting as a provider to other controls in a connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个警告，用户关闭在连接中充当其他控件的提供者的控件时，会显示该警告。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the warning message.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含警告消息的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is a culture-specific message supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是一条由 .NET Framework 提供的、特定于区域性的消息。

trans-unit.source: When a user closes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, normally no message is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当用户关闭<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，通常会显示任何消息。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what it means to close a control, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着若要关闭控件有关的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, when a control is connected to another control and is acting as a provider of data to the other control, a default warning message is displayed when a user attempts to close the control.
trans-unit.target: 但是，当控件连接到另一个控件，并充当提供程序的数据的另一个控件，当用户尝试关闭该控件时，将显示默认警告消息。

trans-unit.source: The message tells users that a provider control is about to close, which means that controls connected to this provider as consumers will no longer have any data to consume.
trans-unit.target: 消息会通知用户，提供程序控制即将关闭，这意味着控制连接到此提供程序，如使用者不会使用任何数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseProviderWarning%2A> property enables developers to customize the warning message that is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseProviderWarning%2A>属性使开发人员能够自定义向用户显示警告消息。

trans-unit.source: If a page developer assigns an empty or null string value to this property, no warning message box will be shown when a user closes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is a provider.
trans-unit.target: 当用户关闭，如果页开发人员将为空或 null 字符串值分配给此属性，将显示任何警告消息框<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>是一个提供程序的控制。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseProviderWarning%2A> property to display a custom warning to users.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseProviderWarning%2A>属性向用户显示的自定义的警告。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: A source code file that contains two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and a custom interface.
trans-unit.target: 源代码文件包含两个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和自定义接口。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that contains two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that can be connected and an `<asp:webpartmanager>` element.
trans-unit.target: 包含两个自定义网页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>可连接控件和`<asp:webpartmanager>`元素。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。

trans-unit.source: The following code contains only the Web page portion of the example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码包含示例的网页部分。

trans-unit.source: You will also need the custom user control and the source code for the custom controls mentioned above.
trans-unit.target: 你还需要自定义用户控件和上面提到的自定义控件的源代码。

trans-unit.source: Obtain these two items from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 从示例部分获取这两项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The following Web page code demonstrates how to assign a custom warning message to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseProviderWarning%2A> property in declarative markup in the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element.
trans-unit.target: 以下 Web 页的代码演示如何将分配到自定义警告消息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseProviderWarning%2A>属性中的声明性标记中`<asp:webpartmanager>`元素。

trans-unit.source: After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode.
trans-unit.target: 你已加载浏览器中的 Web 页后，单击**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**连接**切换页后，可以连接模式。

trans-unit.source: Connect mode uses the `<asp:connectionszone>` element to enable you to create connections between controls.
trans-unit.target: 连接模式使用`<asp:connectionszone>`元素以启用你创建控件之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**.
trans-unit.target: 在连接模式中，单击标题栏中的向下箭头**邮政编码**控件来激活其谓词菜单中，，然后单击**连接**。

trans-unit.source: After the connection user interface (UI) appears, click the **Create a connection to a Consumer** link.
trans-unit.target: 显示连接用户界面 (UI) 后，单击**创建使用者连接**链接。

trans-unit.source: A cell appears that has a drop-down list control.
trans-unit.target: 单元格将显示包含一个下拉列表框控件。

trans-unit.source: Select **Weather Control** in the drop-down list, and click **Connect** to complete the connection of the two controls.
trans-unit.target: 选择**天气控件**下拉列表中，然后单击**连接**来完成这两个控件的连接。

trans-unit.source: Click **Close**, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to normal browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 单击**关闭**，然后使用**显示模式**下拉列表来返回到正常浏览模式的页。

trans-unit.source: Finally, click the verbs menu for the **ZIP Code** control (which is the provider control in this case) and select **Close**.
trans-unit.target: 最后，单击的谓词菜单**邮政编码**控件 （这是提供程序控制在此情况下），然后选择**关闭**。

trans-unit.source: The custom message you assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseProviderWarning%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 自定义消息分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseProviderWarning%2A>属性显示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control that is being closed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 正在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 中关闭的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 或服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Closes a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in such a way that it is not rendered on a Web page, but can be reopened.
trans-unit.target: 以不在网页上呈现，但可以重新打开的方式关闭 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> method removes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control so that it is not rendered on the Web page that originally contained it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>方法移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或其他服务器控件，以使其不呈现最初包含它的 Web 页面上。

trans-unit.source: The closed control is added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> object, which maintains a reference to the closed control and makes it possible for the control to be restored to the page.
trans-unit.target: 已关闭的控件添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>对象，这将保持对已关闭的控件的引用，并使得要还原到页的控件。

trans-unit.source: A closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control still appears in the collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 关闭<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件仍显示在所引用的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Closing a control is different from deleting it.
trans-unit.target: 关闭控件是不同的删除它。

trans-unit.source: Closed controls are still available to be restored to a page, but a deleted control instance is permanently removed and can never be restored.
trans-unit.target: 已关闭的控件仍可用于还原到页中，但已删除的控件实例永久删除，而且将永远无法还原。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control is static (declared in the markup of a page) or dynamic (added to the page programmatically or by a user from a Web Parts catalog), it can be closed and reopened on a page.
trans-unit.target: 而不管是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或服务器控件是 （在页面的标记中声明） 的静态或动态 （添加到页面以编程方式或通过用户从 Web 部件目录），它可以关闭并重新打开页面上。

trans-unit.source: Typically, users can close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control by clicking its verbs menu and selecting the close verb.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，用户可以关闭<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>通过单击其谓词菜单并选择关闭谓词的控件。

trans-unit.source: A control can also be closed by directly calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> method and passing it a reference to `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: 也可以通过直接调用关闭控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>方法并将其传递到的引用`webPart`。

trans-unit.source: On a page where <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls have been closed, if a developer declares an `<asp:catalogzone>` element, and within it adds an `<asp:pagecatalogpart>` element, it provides a simple user interface (UI) for users to restore closed controls to the page at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在页面上其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件已关闭，如果开发人员声明`<asp:catalogzone>`元素，并在其中添加`<asp:pagecatalogpart>`元素，它提供了简单的用户界面 (UI) 的用户还原到页在运行时的已关闭的控件。

trans-unit.source: Users can switch the page into catalog display mode, and the closed controls will appear within the page catalog.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以将页切换到目录的显示模式，并且已关闭的控件将出现在该页目录。

trans-unit.source: Users can select closed controls and add them back to the page at whatever position they desire, and then the selected controls are restored to the page and rendered as normal.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以选择已关闭的控件并将其添加回第一页的任何位置，它们需要，以及然后将所选的控件的还原到页和按正常方式呈现。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> method is called, it raises several events: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging> (if there are multiple controls), and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> (if there are connected controls).
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>方法被调用时，它会发出多个事件： <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging> （如果有多个控件），和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>（如果有连接的控件）。

trans-unit.source: Normally developers can cancel these events, but in certain cases it is not possible to cancel them.
trans-unit.target: 通常，开发人员可以取消这些事件，但在某些情况下它不能取消服务。

trans-unit.source: For details, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> events.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change page display modes.
trans-unit.target: 一个用户控件，使你能够更改页面显示模式。

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: A Web page.
trans-unit.target: 网页。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从示例部分中获取该用户控件的源代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类概述。

trans-unit.source: For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关显示模式和用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分是自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the dynamic compilation approach; thus there is no `Assembly` attribute in the `Register` directive for this control at the top of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用的动态编译方法;因此没有任何`Assembly`属性中`Register`指令对于此控件在 Web 页的顶部。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。

trans-unit.source: The page contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone, with an <`asp:pagecatalogpart>` element declared within it.
trans-unit.target: 页包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>区域，使用 <`asp:pagecatalogpart>`中声明的元素。

trans-unit.source: This is what will contain the closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and enable users to add it back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 这是将包含哪些内容的已关闭<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制并使用户能够将其添加回页面。

trans-unit.source: The `Button1_Click` method directly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> method to close the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, although a user can also close the control through the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: `Button1_Click`方法直接调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>方法来关闭自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，但用户还可关闭通过谓词菜单控件。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, close the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control by clicking the verbs menu (the arrow symbol) in the header of the control, and clicking **Close**.
trans-unit.target: 加载浏览器中后，关闭自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>通过单击该控件的标头中的谓词菜单 （的箭头符号），然后单击控件**关闭**。

trans-unit.source: Now change the page to catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control.
trans-unit.target: 现在将页面更改为目录模式下通过选择**目录**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。

trans-unit.source: The page catalog appears with the closed control.
trans-unit.target: 页目录将显示已关闭的控件。

trans-unit.source: Select the check box next to the closed control, click **Add** to add it to the page, and then click **Close** to return the page to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 选择已关闭的控件旁边的复选框，单击**添加**以将其添加到页上，然后单击**关闭**来返回到浏览模式的页。

trans-unit.source: The control is restored to the page.
trans-unit.target: 控件还原到页。

trans-unit.source: Now close it again, this time by clicking the **Close WebPart** button.
trans-unit.target: 现在关闭它同样，这次通过单击**关闭 web 部件**按钮。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is not in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Controls" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> 不在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Controls" /> 集合中。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="webPart" /> is a shared control and has already been closed by another user.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> 是共享控件，并已被另一个用户关闭。

trans-unit.source: Represents the display mode used for displaying a special user interface (UI) for users to manage connections between <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于显示特殊用户界面 (UI) 以便用户管理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件之间的连接的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode> field references a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object that is created and contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>字段引用自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>对象，创建并包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class without needing an instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 由于这是一个静态对象，你可以引用直接通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>而无需控件的实例的类。

trans-unit.source: When users want to manage connections between <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on a Web page, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> zone has been declared on the page, they can switch the page into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode> mode.
trans-unit.target: 当用户想管理之间的连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件在网页上，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>区域已声明的页上，则可以切换到页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>模式。

trans-unit.source: The connect display mode displays a special UI for managing connections, which includes the ability to connect or disconnect controls, and to edit the details of existing connections.
trans-unit.target: 连接的显示模式显示特殊 UI 管理连接，包括连接或断开连接控件，以及如何编辑现有连接的详细信息的功能。

trans-unit.source: If you want to provide users with the ability to manage connections with the UI provided by the Web Parts control set, you must declare an `<asp:connectionszone>` element in the markup of a page.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要为用户提供的功能使用由 Web 部件控件集提供的用户界面管理连接，您必须声明`<asp:connectionszone>`页面的标记中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the elements for the other types of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zones, you do not need to add any other tags within this element; you simply declare the element by itself.
trans-unit.target: 与其他类型的元素不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>区域，不需要将此元素中的任何其他标记添加; 你只需声明元素本身。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the usage of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode> mode.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>模式。

trans-unit.source: The code example has three parts:
trans-unit.target: 代码示例包含三个部分：

trans-unit.source: A source file that contains an interface and custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that can form a connection.
trans-unit.target: 包含接口和自定义的源文件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>能够形成连接的控件。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that provides a connection UI and demonstrates working with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode> mode.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个连接用户界面并演示如何使用的 Web 页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>模式。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how to run the example.
trans-unit.target: 如何运行该示例的说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is a source file that contains an interface and two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that are designed so they can be connected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第一部分是包含一个接口和两个自定义的源文件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>的设计使它们可以连接的控件。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses the dynamic compilation approach.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用的动态编译方法。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the example is a Web page that hosts the custom controls.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第二部分是承载的自定义控件的网页。

trans-unit.source: Within the server `<script>` tags on the page are several methods that populate a drop-down list with the display modes available on the page.
trans-unit.target: 在服务器中`<script>`页上的标记是填充下拉列表可在页面的显示模式的几种方法。

trans-unit.source: A user can select these from the drop-down list to change the page's display mode.
trans-unit.target: 用户可选择这些从下拉列表中，若要更改页面的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the available display modes is connect display mode, because an `<asp:connectionszone>` element is declared in the page's markup.
trans-unit.target: 可用的显示模式之一是连接的显示模式，因为`<asp:connectionszone>`元素在页面的标记中声明。

trans-unit.source: Notice that this element does not contain any other child elements; it exists only to enable the connection management UI for users.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此元素不包含任何其他子元素;它存在只是为了支持用户的连接管理 UI。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode> mode appears in this example in two places.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>模式将显示在此示例在两个位置。

trans-unit.source: First, in the `Page_Init` method, the connect display mode is added to the drop-down list of display modes, as the code loops through the collection referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 首先，在`Page_Init`方法中，连接的显示模式作为添加到下拉列表中的显示模式，该代码循环访问集合中引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Second, the `Page_PreRender` method checks the current display mode on the page, and if the current mode is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>, a message is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: 第二个，`Page_PreRender`方法检查当前的显示模式，在页上，如果当前的模式和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>，在显示一条消息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, click the drop-down list and select **Connect** to switch the page into connect display mode.
trans-unit.target: 加载浏览器中后，单击下拉列表并选择**连接**页切换到连接的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that a message appears, telling you that the page is in connect display mode.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将显示一条消息，告诉你该页面的是连接的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Now click the verbs menu (an arrow symbol) in the title bar of one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and then click **Connect** in the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 现在，单击谓词菜单 （箭头符号） 之一的标题栏中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，，然后单击**连接**谓词菜单中。

trans-unit.source: After the connection UI is displayed, click the link to create a connection.
trans-unit.target: 连接后显示用户界面，单击链接以创建连接。

trans-unit.source: Use the drop-down list within the connection UI that appears, select the other control that will participate in the connection, and click the **Connect** button.
trans-unit.target: 使用连接用户界面中显示的下拉列表，请选择另一个控件，将参与该连接，并单击**连接**按钮。

trans-unit.source: The connection is established.
trans-unit.target: 建立的连接。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Close** button, and then use the drop-down list at the top of the page to return the page to browse display mode.
trans-unit.target: 单击**关闭**按钮，，然后使用在页面顶部的下拉列表来返回页后，可以浏览的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the collection of all current connections on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取对网页上所有当前连接的集合的引用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection" /> that contains a set of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 包含一组 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Connections%2A> property provides a way to access the current set of connections on a page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Connections%2A>属性提供一种方法，若要访问的当前页上的连接。

trans-unit.source: The collection itself is read-only, and developers who want to manipulate a specific connection from the collection should use <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> methods such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 集合本身是只读的且希望操作集合中的特定连接开发人员应使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>等方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that contains two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that can be connected, and an `<asp:webpartmanager>` element.
trans-unit.target: 包含两个自定义网页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>可连接控件和`<asp:webpartmanager>`元素。

trans-unit.source: A source code file that contains two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and a custom interface.
trans-unit.target: 源代码文件包含两个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和自定义接口。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。

trans-unit.source: The following code contains only the Web page portion of the example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码包含示例的网页部分。

trans-unit.source: You will also need the custom user control and the source code for the custom controls mentioned above.
trans-unit.target: 你还需要自定义用户控件和上面提到的自定义控件的源代码。

trans-unit.source: Obtain these two items from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 从示例部分获取这两项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The following Web page code demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Connections%2A> property programmatically to get the count of current connections on a page.
trans-unit.target: 以下 Web 页的代码演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Connections%2A>属性以编程方式获取页上的当前连接的计数。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the `<script>` tag section, the code to handle two events for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control accesses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Connections%2A> property to obtain the count.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在`<script>`标记部分中，代码以处理两个事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Connections%2A>属性以获取该计数。

trans-unit.source: After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode.
trans-unit.target: 你已加载浏览器中的 Web 页后，单击**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**连接**切换页后，可以连接模式。

trans-unit.source: Connect mode uses the `<asp:connectionszone>` element to enable you to create connections between controls.
trans-unit.target: 连接模式使用`<asp:connectionszone>`元素以启用你创建控件之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**.
trans-unit.target: 在连接模式中，单击标题栏中的向下箭头**邮政编码**控件来激活其谓词菜单中，，然后单击**连接**。

trans-unit.source: After the connection user interface (UI) displays, click the **Create a connection to a Consumer** link.
trans-unit.target: 连接用户界面 (UI) 显示后，单击**创建使用者连接**链接。

trans-unit.source: A cell appears that has a drop-down list control.
trans-unit.target: 单元格将显示包含一个下拉列表框控件。

trans-unit.source: Select **Weather Control** in the drop-down list, and click **Connect** to complete the connection of the two controls.
trans-unit.target: 选择**天气控件**下拉列表中，然后单击**连接**来完成这两个控件的连接。

trans-unit.source: Click **Close**, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to normal browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 单击**关闭**，然后使用**显示模式**下拉列表来返回到正常浏览模式的页。

trans-unit.source: Note that a label now displays the number of connections and the number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，一个标签现在显示的连接数和数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: If you now return to connect mode and disconnect the two controls, when you return to browse mode, the label's content should be updated and there should be no connections.
trans-unit.target: 如果您现在返回到连接模式并断开连接两个控件，则在返回到浏览模式下，应更新标签的内容，并且应该有任何连接。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after all the current Web Parts connections on a page are not only connected, but have also begun actively sharing data between the consumer and provider controls involved in each connection.
trans-unit.target: 在页上的所有当前 Web 部件连接不仅已经连接，而且已经开始在每个连接所涉及的使用者控件和提供者控件之间共享数据之后发生。

trans-unit.source: In the life cycle of connections, this event occurs after a page completes its loading process.
trans-unit.target: 生命周期的连接，此事件发生后页面完成其加载过程。

trans-unit.source: It also occurs after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event, which indicates only that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server controls involved in a specific connection have successfully connected.
trans-unit.target: 它还后发生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>事件，只是指示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或已成功连接所涉及的特定连接的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: In a case where there are multiple connections on a page, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated> method indicates that all the valid Web Parts connections on a page are now active and able to share data.
trans-unit.target: 在情况下在有多个连接在页中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivated>方法指示在页面上的所有有效 Web 部件连接现活动和能够共享数据。

trans-unit.source: Knowing that all connections are active, developers can carry out any number of tasks, including notifying users of the status of all the connections, notifying consumer controls to process and display data from their providers, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 了解所有连接都处于活动状态后，开发人员可以执行任意数量的任务，包括将通知用户的所有连接的状态通知使用者控件处理和显示来自其提供程序，数据等等。

trans-unit.source: This event is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnConnectionsActivated%2A> method, which raises the event and allows developers to create custom handlers for the event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnConnectionsActivated%2A>方法，它引发事件并允许开发人员创建自定义事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnConnectionsActivated` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in the page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以创建自定义事件处理程序，通过添加`OnConnectionsActivated`属性设为`<asp:webpartmanager>`页上，，然后将自定义的方法名称分配到的属性中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during the process of activating all the established Web Parts connections on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 在激活网页上所有已建立的 Web 部件连接的过程中发生。

trans-unit.source: In the life cycle of connections, this event occurs as a page is completing its loading process, just before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ActivateConnections%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 生命周期的连接，会发生此事件页之前完成其加载进程，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ActivateConnections%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: It is different from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> event, which involves a particular connection between <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls.
trans-unit.target: 不同于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>事件，这就需要之间的特定连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或其他服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating> event occurs when all the possible connections on a page have been connected and are about to be activated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating>事件发生时在页面上的所有可能的连接已连接，并且要激活。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating> event is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnConnectionsActivating%2A> method, which raises the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectionsActivating>与关联事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnConnectionsActivating%2A>方法，将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Control developers who want to extend the type of connections that can be added to a page could override the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnConnectionsActivating%2A> method and activate additional types of connections.
trans-unit.target: 控件开发人员想要扩展的可以添加到页面的连接类型可以重写受保护<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnConnectionsActivating%2A>方法并激活其他类型的连接。

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnConnectionsActivating` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in the page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以创建自定义事件处理程序，通过添加`OnConnectionsActivating`属性设为`<asp:webpartmanager>`页上，，然后将自定义的方法名称分配到的属性中的元素。

trans-unit.source: Creates a connection between two <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls (or other server controls capable of forming connections) that reside in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zone.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 区域中的两个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 控件（或其他能建立连接的服务器控件）之间创建一个连接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method forms a connection between any two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that can be connected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>方法窗体的任何这两者之间的连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>可以连接的控件。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method to create a connection, you might also want to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CanConnectWebParts%2A> method in a conditional check to ensure that the controls meet the requirements for forming a connection.
trans-unit.target: 在之前调用此方法来创建的连接，你可能还需要调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CanConnectWebParts%2A>条件检查，以确保控件符合要求的形成连接中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to create a connection between two server controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 还有可能不是两个服务器控件之间创建连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: In general, the two controls would have to be custom server controls (for example, controls that inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> or existing ASP.NET server controls) so that you could add the required members.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，必须在两个控件是自定义服务器控件 (例如，从继承的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>或现有的 ASP.NET 服务器控件)，以便你可以添加所需的成员。

trans-unit.source: The controls would also have to meet the requirements specified below.
trans-unit.target: 控件还必须满足下方指定要求。

trans-unit.source: Any type of connection scenario between two controls must meet the following requirements to be able to connect:
trans-unit.target: 任何类型的两个控件之间的连接方案必须满足以下要求，以进行连接：

trans-unit.source: Each control resides in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone (it does not have to be the same zone).
trans-unit.target: 每个控件位于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>（它不必是同一区域） 的区域。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the Web Parts control set, the provider control in a connection implements an interface as a public method that serves as a callback to the provider, and has a `ConnectionProvider` metadata attribute on the method to identify it as a provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 部件控件集中实现时，连接中的提供者控件实现一个接口作为用作回调到提供程序，并具有一个公共方法`ConnectionProvider`的方法，以标识为提供程序连接上的元数据属性点。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetProviderConnectionPoints%2A> method that retrieves provider connection points is virtual, a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control does not necessarily have to use the same metadata attribute.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetProviderConnectionPoints%2A>方法检索提供程序连接点是虚方法，派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件不一定具有要使用相同的元数据属性。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the Web Parts control set, the consumer control in a connection also has a special method that enables it to get a reference to the interface that is exposed in the provider's callback method, and the consumer has a `ConnectionConsumer` metadata attribute on the method to identify it as a consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 部件控件集中实现时，在连接中，使用者控件还具有一种特殊的方法，使它能够获取对在提供程序的回调方法中，公开的接口的引用和使用者具有`ConnectionConsumer`上的元数据属性该方法以标识为使用者连接点。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetConsumerConnectionPoints%2A> method that retrieves consumer connection points is virtual, a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control does not necessarily have to use the same metadata attribute.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetConsumerConnectionPoints%2A>方法检索使用者连接点是虚方法，派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件不一定具有要使用相同的元数据属性。

trans-unit.source: The callback methods must either be compatible, in that the consumer can use the type of interface supplied in the provider's callback method (meaning that the consumer and provider can share data directly), or the developer must use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object to transform the data from the provider into a form that the consumer can use.
trans-unit.target: 回调方法必须是兼容的中 （这意味着使用者和提供程序可以共享数据直接） 提供程序的回调方法或开发人员, 提供的接口，使用者可以将它们的类型必须使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>对象传递给将从提供程序的数据转换为使用者可以使用的窗体。

trans-unit.source: When you do not need a transformer, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 当你不需要转换器时，则使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: When you need a transformer, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 当需要转换器时，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer%29>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that has the role of furnishing data to another connected control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件，负责向另一个连接控件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: A method that serves as a callback method for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 用作连接回调方法的方法。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the Web Parts control set, this is a public method in <c>provider</c> that is marked with a <see langword="ConnectionProvider" /> metadata attribute.
trans-unit.target: 正如在 Web 部件控件集中实现的一样，这是 <c>provider</c> 中以 <see langword="ConnectionProvider" /> 元数据属性标记的一个公共方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that has the role of receiving data from <c>provider</c>, and then processing or displaying it.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件，负责接收来自 <c>provider</c> 的数据，然后处理或显示接收到的数据。

trans-unit.source: A method that connects with <c>providerConnectionPoint</c> to receive the data for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 与 <c>providerConnectionPoint</c> 连接的方法，它接收连接的数据。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the Web Parts control set, this is a public method in <c>consumer</c> that is marked with a <see langword="ConnectionConsumer" /> metadata attribute.
trans-unit.target: 正如在 Web 部件控件集中实现的一样，这是 <c>consumer</c> 中以 <see langword="ConnectionConsumer" /> 元数据属性标记的一个公共方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a connection between two <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> controls using only the references to the controls and their specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 只使用对控件的引用和控件所指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 对象在两个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint" /> 控件之间创建连接。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that contains the various information about the provider and the consumer needed for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />，包含连接所需的提供者和使用者的各种信息。

trans-unit.source: This overload is used to connect controls when their connection points are sufficiently compatible that they can connect without using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object.
trans-unit.target: 此重载用于在其连接点充分兼容确保它们而无需使用连接时连接控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>对象。

trans-unit.source: When this overload of the method is called, it simply passes the call to the other overloaded version of the method, and passes `null` for the parameter that requires a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object.
trans-unit.target: 当调用该方法的此重载时，它只需将传递到另一重载版本的方法的调用并将传递`null`需要的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>对象。

trans-unit.source: When you attempt to connect two controls programmatically, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CanConnectWebParts%2A> method in a conditional check to determine whether the controls can be directly connected.
trans-unit.target: 当你尝试以编程方式连接两个控件时，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CanConnectWebParts%2A>条件检查，以确定是否可以直接连接控件中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use this method to create a connection programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法以编程方式创建的连接。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类概述。

trans-unit.source: From that example, you will need the source code for the user control that allows you to change display modes on the page, and the source code for the two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 从该示例中，你需要允许您更改在页上，显示模式的用户控件的源代码和源代码的两个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The code for the Web page that hosts the two controls follows.
trans-unit.target: 承载这两个 Web 页的代码控制如下所示。

trans-unit.source: The page uses `Register` directives at the top to declare the user control and the custom controls.
trans-unit.target: 页使用`Register`顶部的指令以声明的用户控件和自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: The custom controls are then referenced declaratively within an `<asp:webpartzone>` element.
trans-unit.target: 然后以声明方式在引用的自定义控件`<asp:webpartzone>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The code that handles the `Button1_Click` method creates a connection between the controls by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 处理的代码`Button1_Click`方法创建使用控件之间的连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, click the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to form the connection.
trans-unit.target: 加载浏览器中后，单击**连接 web 部件控件**按钮以形成连接。

trans-unit.source: You can then enter some data in the text box, and click the **Enter 5-digit ZIP Code** button to demonstrate that the controls are connected, and that data entered in the first control is updated in the second.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以在文本框中，输入一些数据，并单击**输入 5 位邮政编码**按钮演示控件已连接，以及在第二个更新的第一个控件中输入该数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of dynamic collections is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 动态集合的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件集合是只读的。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has the role of furnishing data to another connected control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />，它的角色是为另一个连接的控件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: A public method in <c>provider</c> that is marked with a <see langword="ConnectionProvider" /> metadata attribute, and serves as a callback method for the connection.
trans-unit.target: <c>provider</c> 中以 <see langword="ConnectionProvider" /> 元数据属性标记的公共方法，可用作连接的回调方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has the role of receiving data from <c>provider</c> or <c>transformer</c>, and then processing or displaying it.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />，负责从 <c>provider</c> 或 <c>transformer</c> 中接收数据，然后处理或显示接收到的数据。

trans-unit.source: A public method in <c>consumer</c> that is marked with a <see langword="ConnectionConsumer" /> metadata attribute, and connects with <c>providerConnectionPoint</c> to receive the data for the connection.
trans-unit.target: <c>consumer</c> 中以 <see langword="ConnectionConsumer" /> 元数据属性标记的公共方法，可与 <c>providerConnectionPoint</c> 连接以接收连接的数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that enables a connection between two controls by converting the data from <c>provider</c> to a format that <c>consumer</c> can process.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" />，它通过将数据从 <c>provider</c> 转换为 <c>consumer</c> 可以处理的格式来实现两个控件之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: Creates a connection between two <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> controls using the references to the controls, their specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint" /> objects, and a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用对两个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> 控件的引用、它们的指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint" /> 对象和一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> 对象在这两个控件之间创建连接。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that contains the information about the provider, consumer, and transformer needed for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />，它包含有关提供者、使用者以及连接所需的转换器的信息。

trans-unit.source: This overload is used to connect controls when their connection points are incompatible.
trans-unit.target: 此重载用于在其连接点不兼容时连接控件。

trans-unit.source: The incompatibility occurs when `consumer` implements a different interface than `provider` as its connection point.
trans-unit.target: 发生不兼容时`consumer`实现其他接口比`provider`作为连接点。

trans-unit.source: The transformer converts the data into a type that can be understood by `consumer`.
trans-unit.target: Transformer 将数据转换可以理解的一种`consumer`。

trans-unit.source: Connections have already been activated in <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" />.
trans-unit.target: 连接已在 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 中激活。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />, server, or user controls that are contained in <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zones on a Web page and are managed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含在网页的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 区域中并由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 控件管理的所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />、服务器或用户控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> that contains all controls managed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" />，包含由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件管理的所有控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Controls%2A> property does not reference the other controls that are referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, such as the various zone controls, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, and others.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Controls%2A>属性不引用所引用的其他控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制，如各种区域控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件和其他人。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the Web Parts control set, and in most development situations it is not intended to be called from your code.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件集，以及在不应在代码中调用的大多数开发情况下使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, although the property is public, it is hidden from IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: 出于此原因，虽然属性是公共的但会将其隐藏的 IntelliSense。

trans-unit.source: Developers who want to access the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control should use its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员想要访问的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或由其他服务器控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件应使用其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Used by the Web Parts control set to create a copy of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control for the purpose of adding the control to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 由 Web 部件控件集用来创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或服务器控件的副本，以向网页中添加该控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> to be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到页中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CopyWebPart%2A> method directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 不能调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CopyWebPart%2A>在代码中直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as part of the process of adding a new dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control to a page.
trans-unit.target: 内部调用此方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件添加新的动态的过程的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或到页上的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic control is added to a page programmatically or through the Web Parts user interface (UI), for example by a user adding a control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to a static control, which is declared directly in the markup of a page.
trans-unit.target: 动态控件添加到页面以编程方式或通过 Web 部件用户界面 (UI)，例如用户从控件，而不是直接在页面的标记中声明一个静态控件的目录中添加控件。

trans-unit.source: The method can be overridden in a derived class if developers want to enable the method to handle additional control copying scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 如果开发人员想要使该方法以处理复制方案的更多控制，则可以在派生类中重写方法。

trans-unit.source: For details, see the Notes to Inheritors section.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅对继承者部分的说明。

trans-unit.source: When a new dynamic control is added, if it is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CopyWebPart%2A> method returns a new instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个新的动态控件时，如果它是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CopyWebPart%2A>方法返回的控件的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If the control being added is some other type of server control (such as a user control, a custom control, or an ASP.NET control), the control will already have been wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在添加的控件 （如用户控件、 一个自定义控件或 ASP.NET 控件） 的服务器控件的某些其他类型，已将具有与包装控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>由 Web 部件控件集的对象。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CopyWebPart%2A> method encounters a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control, it returns a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control with a new instance of the child control wrapped within it.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CopyWebPart%2A>方法遇到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件，它将返回的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件中它包装的子控件的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CopyWebPart%2A> method creates a new copy of a control to return, it also resets the values of all the properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CopyWebPart%2A>方法创建要返回的控件的新副本，它还将重置所有属性的值为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Note that, if you want to preserve the values of the personalizable properties and have them copied to the new control instance, you should call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CopyPersonalizationState%2A> method as well.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否你想要保留可个性化属性的值，并将它们复制到新的控件实例，应调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CopyPersonalizationState%2A>以及方法。

trans-unit.source: The final step carried out by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CopyWebPart%2A> method is to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDynamicWebPartID%2A> method to obtain a new ID for the control.
trans-unit.target: 由执行的最后一步<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CopyWebPart%2A>方法是调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDynamicWebPartID%2A>方法来获取控件的新 ID。

trans-unit.source: Because the method obtains a new ID for a copied control, you should not rely on referencing a dynamic control that is added to a page by its original ID.
trans-unit.target: 此方法获取复制的控件的新 ID，因为你不应依赖于引用原始 id 添加到页面的动态控件

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should reference the new instance of the control returned by the method.
trans-unit.target: 相反，应引用该方法返回的控件的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The method is declared as <see langword="virtual" /> so that developers could inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class, override the method, and provide for additional scenarios in which it could create copies of controls.
trans-unit.target: 该方法声明为<see langword="virtual" />，以便开发人员无法从此继承<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />类，请重写方法，并提供有关其他方案，它可以在其中创建控件的副本。

trans-unit.source: For example, the method could optionally receive as input a control that has been serialized into an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，该方法无法 （可选） 作为输入接收已序列化到 XML 文件的控件。

trans-unit.source: The method could deserialize the XML (if present), and then call the base method to handle the existing cases and to return a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 该方法无法反序列化 XML （如果存在），然后调用基方法来处理现有用例，并返回的新实例<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of transformers specified in a Web site's configuration file and adds them to the collection of transformers referenced by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AvailableTransformers" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 创建一组在网站配置文件中指定的转换器，并将它们添加到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AvailableTransformers" /> 属性所引用的转换器的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of transformers specified in a Web site's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 网站的配置文件中指定的转换器的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden to add additional transformers that can be used by the application.
trans-unit.target: 可以重写此方法以添加其他应用程序可以使用的转换器。

trans-unit.source: For example, the method could be written to retrieve a list of available transformers from a Web service.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以编写该方法从 Web 服务中检索可用转换器的列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of all controls that are managed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 返回网页上的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件所管理的所有控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> consisting of all the various Web Parts controls managed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" />，由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件所管理的所有 Web 部件控件组成。

trans-unit.source: Because this method is protected and sealed, it is visible to classes that inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class, but it cannot be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是受保护的密封，因为它是继承的类可见<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />类，但它不能重写。

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of all possible display modes for a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: 为 Web 部件应用程序创建由所有可能的显示模式组成的显示模式集。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection" /> that contains all the display modes that are supported.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection" />，包含所有受支持的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: This method creates the list of all possible display modes, not just the display modes supported on a particular page.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建的所有可能的显示模式，而不仅仅是支持特定页面上的显示模式的列表。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the supported display modes, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关受支持的显示模式的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Web Parts control set creates the following set of display modes to be used on Web Parts pages:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Web 部件控件集创建下列一组用于在 Web 部件页上的显示模式：

trans-unit.source: Developers can create custom display modes, either with or without accompanying custom zones that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> classes.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以创建自定义显示模式，可以使用或不相关的自定义派生自的区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>类。

trans-unit.source: To create a custom display mode, you must inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class, and to add your display mode as a supported mode on a page, you must inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的自定义显示模式，你必须从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>类，也要添加为支持的模式，在页面上的显示模式，你必须从继承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类并重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you add display modes by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Add%2A> method, you should add them in the order that you want them to appear in any user interface (UI) controls (such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control) that provide to users the possible display modes on a page.
trans-unit.target: 当使用添加显示模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Add%2A>方法，你应将其添加你希望它们出现在任何用户界面 (UI) 控件中的顺序 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>控件)，向用户提供可能的显示模式在页面上。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The code example has five parts:
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例包括五个部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that hosts the other controls.
trans-unit.target: 承载其他控件的网页。

trans-unit.source: A user control that resides in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone on the Web page, and enables you to enter and display text in a label.
trans-unit.target: 用户控件，驻留在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>区域在网页上，并使您能够输入和显示在标签中的文本。

trans-unit.source: A source code file that contains two controls.
trans-unit.target: 包含两个控件的源代码文件。

trans-unit.source: One is a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, and the other is a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object to add to the page's default display modes.
trans-unit.target: 一个是一个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件，以及其他是一个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>要添加到页面的默认显示模式对象。

trans-unit.source: A source code file that contains two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and a custom interface.
trans-unit.target: 源代码文件包含两个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和自定义接口。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从示例部分中获取该用户控件的源代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类概述。

trans-unit.source: For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关显示模式和用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第二部分是网页。

trans-unit.source: It contains two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> controls, both user controls, and the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 它包含两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制，用户控件和自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: Notice the `Register` directives at the top of the page to reference the user controls and namespace for the compiled controls.
trans-unit.target: 请注意`Register`页顶部的指令以引用的用户控件和已编译的控件的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the example is the user control for entering and displaying text.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第三个部分是用于输入和显示文本的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: It uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control to create multiple views of the UI.
trans-unit.target: 它使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>控件创建的用户界面的多个视图。

trans-unit.source: One view appears with the `Button1` button, the other without.
trans-unit.target: 一个视图显示与`Button1`按钮，另一个没有。

trans-unit.source: Notice that in the overridden `OnPreRender` method, the code checks to see whether the page is currently in the custom display mode and, if so, displays the first view of the user control, which includes the button.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在重写`OnPreRender`方法，代码检查以查看是否页目前处于的自定义显示模式，因此，如果是这样，显示用户控件，其中包括按钮的第一个视图。

trans-unit.source: If the page is not in the custom display mode, for example if the page is in browse or design mode, the button is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果该页是中的自定义显示模式，例如，如果页是在浏览或设计模式下，不会隐藏按钮。

trans-unit.source: The fourth part of the example is the source file for the two custom classes.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的第四个部分是两个自定义类的源文件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes%2A> method, and that it first calls the base method to add all the default display modes, and then adds the custom display mode.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes%2A>方法，并且它首先调用基方法，以添加所有默认显示模式，然后添加自定义显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The custom display mode class, `InLineEditDisplayMode`, simply inherits from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>, sets the name of the display mode in the constructor, and overrides a number of the base properties to establish the characteristics of the custom display.
trans-unit.target: 自定义显示模式类， `InLineEditDisplayMode`，只需继承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>、 构造函数中，在设置的显示模式的名称和重写基属性以建立自定义显示的特征数。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: To run the code example, load the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，加载浏览器中的页。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the page is currently in browse mode, and no button is visible.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该页是当前处于浏览模式，并且没有按钮是可见的。

trans-unit.source: Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, change the page to **Inline Edit Display** mode, and notice that now the `Button1` button is visible in the lower user control.
trans-unit.target: 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件中，更改到页**内联编辑显示**模式，并请注意现在`Button1`按钮是在较低的用户控件中可见。

trans-unit.source: Add some text, and click the button to update the control.
trans-unit.target: 添加一些文本，然后单击按钮来更新控件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the page display is returned to browse mode, the text you entered is now displayed, and the button is once again hidden because the page is no longer in the custom display mode.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，页面显示返回到浏览模式，并现在显示您输入的文本，而按钮再次处于隐藏状态，因为页不再的自定义显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique value to serve as an ID for a dynamic connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个唯一值，用于充当动态连接的 ID。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a unique ID for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含连接的唯一 ID 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDynamicConnectionID%2A> method generates a GUID value and converts it to a string to serve as the unique ID for a connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDynamicConnectionID%2A>方法生成的 GUID 值，并将其转换为字符串，以便作为连接的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: The method is called each time a dynamic connection is created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法叫做每次创建动态连接。

trans-unit.source: Developers can override this method in a derived <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> class to change the implementation for generating a unique ID.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以重写此方法在派生<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />类更改的实现以生成唯一 id。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the control for which an ID is being generated.
trans-unit.target: 为其生成 ID 的控件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Generates a unique ID for a dynamic <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 为动态 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件生成唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the unique ID for a control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含控件的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls are added to a Web page, they can be static (which means the control is declared in the page markup) or dynamic (which means they are added programmatically).
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件添加到网页，则它们可以是静态 （这意味着页标记中声明的控件） 或动态 （这意味着它们将以编程方式添加）。

trans-unit.source: In any scenario where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is creating new dynamic controls to add to the page, it calls this method to generate a unique ID.
trans-unit.target: 在任何方案中其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件创建新的动态控件将添加到页上，它会调用此方法以生成唯一 id。

trans-unit.source: The method is virtual so that developers can override it if they want to provide a custom implementation for generating the ID.
trans-unit.target: 方法是虚方法，使开发人员可以重写它如果他们想要提供自定义实现来生成 id。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPartType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPartType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that is the ID of the failing control.
trans-unit.target: 作为失败控件 ID 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> is involved in the failure, the ID is the ID of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: 如果失败涉及 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" />，则该 ID 为其子服务器控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: A string that is the name of the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the failed control.
trans-unit.target: 字符串，失败控件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 名称。

trans-unit.source: If a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> is involved in the failure, the type name is the type of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: 如果失败涉及 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" />，则该类型名称是其子服务器控件的类型。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to a user control, if a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> that contains a child user control is involved in the failure.
trans-unit.target: 包含用户控件路径的字符串（如果失败涉及包含子用户控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" />）。
