trans-unit.source: A string that returns the ID of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" />, if that type of control was involved in the failure to load or create a control.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> ID 的字符串（如果加载或创建控件的失败涉及该类型的控件）。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the error message to display on the page.
trans-unit.target: 包含要在页中显示的错误消息的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a special control that is inserted into a page and displayed for end users, when an attempt to load or create a dynamic <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control fails for some reason.
trans-unit.target: 当加载或创建动态 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件的尝试因某种原因失败时，创建插入页中并向最终用户显示的特殊控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> that is inserted into a page in place of a control that failed to be loaded or created.
trans-unit.target: 插入页中以替代未能加载或创建的控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A> method is called when the Web Parts control set attempts to load or create an instance of a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control, and it fails for some reason.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A>时 Web 部件控件集尝试加载或创建的动态实例调用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或服务器控件和它出于某些原因而失败。

trans-unit.source: The method creates an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> object, assigns an error message to it, and returns it.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>对象，将一条错误消息分配给它，并将其返回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control is inserted in place of the control that failed, and its error message is displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>控件插入失败，在控件的位置，并且其错误消息显示在页上。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A> method directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 不能调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A>在代码中直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: However, you can inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class and extend the method.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以从继承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类和扩展方法。

trans-unit.source: For details, see the Notes for Inheritors section.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅继承者部分的说明。

trans-unit.source: End users can work with an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control in a page much like they would a normal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 最终用户可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>控制在页中很多像常规<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: To remove the error message, they can close the control by clicking the close verb, at which point the control will be added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> object, like any other closed control.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除错误消息，用户可以控制通过单击关闭关闭谓词，此时该控件将添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>对象，像任何其他已关闭的控件一样。

trans-unit.source: If an end user deletes an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control, the server control that failed to load will also be deleted from the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果最终用户删除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>控件时，无法加载服务器控件也将删除从页中。

trans-unit.source: If you want to customize the information that is returned in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control, you can override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> method, call the base method, assign different values to the parameters passed to the base method, and then return the resulting <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要自定义中返回的信息<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" />控件，可以重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)" />方法，调用基方法，将不同的值分配给传递给该基方法的参数，然后返回生成<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" />控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you do not want end users to see the <paramref name="originalPath" /> value (which would show the virtual directory path of a user control), when you call the base method you could pass an empty string ("") for that parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你不希望最终用户查看<paramref name="originalPath" />值 （该值将显示用户控件的虚拟目录路径），在调用基方法时无法传递一个空字符串 ("") 为该参数。

trans-unit.source: You can also customize the behavior of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" /> control itself, by inheriting from it.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以自定义的行为<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart" />控件本身，通过它继承。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to override its <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title" /> or <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能希望重写其<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title" />或<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowMinimize" />属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a personalization object to contain a user's personalization data for the current Web page.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个个性化设置对象，该对象包含当前网页的用户个性化设置数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> to contain a user's personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" />，包含用户的个性化设置数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreatePersonalization%2A> method returns an object to contain and manage the user's personalization settings for the current page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreatePersonalization%2A>方法返回的对象来包含和管理针对当前页的用户的个性化设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control manages this object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件管理此对象。

trans-unit.source: A server control that is not a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Wraps a server control that is not a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> object, so that the control can have Web Parts functionality.
trans-unit.target: 用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 对象包装一个不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> 控件的服务器控件，以使该控件能具有 Web 部件的功能。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> that wraps <paramref name="control" /> and enables it to function as a true <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" />，包装 <paramref name="control" /> 并使其功能与真正的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件一样。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A> method is the main mechanism for enabling server controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls to take on the same functionality as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and thus to participate fully in Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A>方法是用于启用不的服务器控件的主要机制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件以与相同的功能对其执行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，因此完全参与 Web 部件应用程序。

trans-unit.source: By using this method, developers vastly expand the number of server controls that they can use in a Web Parts application, because virtually any type of server control--standard ASP.NET controls, user controls, and custom controls--can be used.
trans-unit.target: 大大地使用此方法，开发人员展开他们可以使用 Web 部件应用程序中的服务器控件的数，因为几乎任何类型的服务器控件-可以使用标准 ASP.NET 控件、 用户控件和自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control also uses this method in two other scenarios to wrap server controls with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件还使用此方法在两种情况下包装服务器控件与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>对象。

trans-unit.source: When users add server controls to a page by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> control, if the imported control is not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将服务器控件添加到页上通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>控制，如果导入的控件不是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Also, when server controls are declared in persistence format within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone on a Web page, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A> method is called for any controls that are not <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当服务器控件中声明中的持久性格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>在网页上，区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A>方法调用的任何控件不<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: When you add a server control to a zone programmatically, a typical approach is to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A> method to wrap the control with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object, and then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AddWebPart%2A> method to add the control to the collection of all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls on the page, which is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当以编程方式向区域添加服务器控件时，典型的方法是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A>方法包装控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>对象，，然后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AddWebPart%2A>方法将控件添加到所有的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件在页上，通过引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In the `Button2_Click method`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A> method is called to wrap a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object before adding it to the zone.
trans-unit.target: 在`Button2_Click method`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateWebPart%2A>调用方法来包装<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>之前将其添加到该区域的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden to use a derived <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> class instead of the base class provided with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 可以重写此方法，以便使用派生<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" />类相反的基类提供的 Web 部件控件集。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom warning message displayed to end users when they delete a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个自定义警告消息，当最终用户删除一个控件时，将显示该消息。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the warning message.
trans-unit.target: 包含警告消息文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a localized warning message.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是经本地化的警告消息。

trans-unit.source: When a user deletes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, normally a default warning message is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当用户删除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，通常显示默认警告消息。

trans-unit.source: It warns the user that when this instance of a control is deleted, the deletion is permanent.
trans-unit.target: 它会警告用户控件的此实例中删除时，删除是永久性。

trans-unit.source: The page developer might provide users with a way to add a new instance of the control to the page (such as through a catalog of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, or through some programmatic means), but the current instance of a control that is deleted is permanently removed.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以向用户提供了如何向页面添加控件的新实例 (如通过的目录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，或通过某些编程的方式)，但永久移除已删除的控件的当前实例。

trans-unit.source: The dialog box that displays the warning includes a button for the user to cancel the deletion, if desired.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要，将显示警告对话框中包含一个按钮，用户取消删除操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A> property enables developers to set the warning message that is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A>属性使开发人员能够设置向用户显示该警告消息。

trans-unit.source: If a page developer assigns an empty string ("") value to this property, no warning message dialog box will be shown when a user deletes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果页开发人员分配一个空字符串 ("") 将显示此属性，没有警告消息对话框中的值，当用户中删除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A> property is not displayed in the case of static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and server controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A>属性未显示在静态的情况下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Static controls are server controls that are declared within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 静态控件是在内声明的服务器控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域中的网页上的标记。

trans-unit.source: Because such controls are static, they cannot be deleted, so the delete warning message is never displayed in that case.
trans-unit.target: 此类控件是静态的因为它们不能删除，因此将永远不会在这种情况下显示删除警告消息。

trans-unit.source: Static controls can be closed by a user, but a closed control is added to the page catalog, from which it can be added back to the page by a user, whereas a deleted control can never be recovered.
trans-unit.target: 静态控件可以关闭的用户，但已关闭的控件添加到页目录中，从中它可以重新添加到页面的用户，而永远无法恢复删除的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A> property declaratively and programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A>属性以声明方式和以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: There are four parts to the code example:
trans-unit.target: 有四个部分的代码示例：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change page display modes.
trans-unit.target: 一个用户控件，使你能够更改页面显示模式。

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: A Web page.
trans-unit.target: 网页。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从示例部分中获取该用户控件的源代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类概述。

trans-unit.source: For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关显示模式和用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第二部分是自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the dynamic compilation approach; thus there is no `Assembly` attribute in the `Register` directive for this control at the top of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用的动态编译方法;因此没有任何`Assembly`属性中`Register`指令对于此控件在 Web 页的顶部。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。

trans-unit.source: The page contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone, with the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control declared in the zone, so that a user can add it to the page at run time.
trans-unit.target: 页包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>区域，使用的自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>在区域中，声明的控件，以便用户可以将其添加到页在运行时。

trans-unit.source: Note that only dynamic controls (controls that are added to a page programmatically or from a catalog like this one) can be deleted from a page.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以从页中删除仅动态控件 （以编程方式或从类似于此目录添加到页面的控件）。

trans-unit.source: Static controls (controls that are declared within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone in the markup of a page) can be closed, but never deleted.
trans-unit.target: 静态控件 (在内声明的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域中的页面的标记) 被关闭，但是永远不会删除。

trans-unit.source: The `<asp:webpartmanager>` element declares a custom value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A> property by using the `DeleteWarning` attribute.
trans-unit.target: `<asp:webpartmanager>`元素声明的自定义值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A>属性使用`DeleteWarning`属性。

trans-unit.source: The `Button1_Click` method assigns another custom value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `Button1_Click`方法将分配到另一个自定义值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, you need to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 加载浏览器中后，你需要添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>到页面的控件。

trans-unit.source: Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, select catalog mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，选择目录模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog appears, select the check box next to the custom control, click **Add** to add it to the page, and then click **Close** to return the page to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 出现目录时，选择自定义控件旁边的复选框，单击**添加**以将其添加到页上，然后单击**关闭**来返回到浏览模式的页。

trans-unit.source: Now that the control is visible, you can delete it.
trans-unit.target: 现在，控件可见，则可以将其删除。

trans-unit.source: Using the **Display Mode** control again, switch the page into design mode (you cannot delete controls while the page is in browse mode).
trans-unit.target: 使用**显示模式**再次控件中，将页切换到设计模式 （页在浏览模式中时不能删除控件）。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu (the arrow symbol) in the header of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and select **Delete**.
trans-unit.target: 单击的标头中的谓词菜单 （的箭头符号）<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，并选择**删除**。

trans-unit.source: The warning that you set on the `DeleteWarning` attribute appears.
trans-unit.target: 在设置的警告`DeleteWarning`特性随即显示。

trans-unit.source: Click **Cancel**.
trans-unit.target: 单击**取消**。

trans-unit.source: Now click the button labeled **Change Delete Warning**, which changes the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 现在，单击标记按钮**更改删除警告**，其中以编程方式更改的属性值。

trans-unit.source: From the verbs menu on the control, select **Delete** again, and notice that this time the other warning message appears.
trans-unit.target: 从在控件上的谓词菜单中，选择**删除**试，请注意，此时会出现其他警告消息。

trans-unit.source: The server control to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Permanently removes a dynamic instance of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control from a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 永久地从网页中移除 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件的动态实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A> method permanently removes the control represented by the `webPart` parameter from a page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A>方法永久移除所表示的控件`webPart`从页中的参数。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a closed control, which is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control and can be added back to the page, a deleted control instance can never be added back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 与关闭的控件，它将添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控制，可以在已删除的控件实例可以永远不会添加回页回页上，添加。

trans-unit.source: As implemented by the Web Parts control set, the ability for users to delete a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control depends on the user and the personalization scope in which the control was added to a page.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件的实施方式的设置，用户若要删除动态的能力<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件取决于用户和控件添加到页面中的个性化设置范围。

trans-unit.source: If the control is added when the page is in shared scope (by a user who has permissions), then the control cannot be deleted by individual users when the page is in user scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件添加页面时共享作用域中 （由具有权限的用户），然后控件无法删除由各个用户页面时用户作用域中。

trans-unit.source: Only dynamic controls can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 可以删除仅动态控件。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic controls are added to a page programmatically or by users adding controls from a catalog.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式或通过用户从目录中添加控件动态控件添加到页。

trans-unit.source: Static controls are added to a page declaratively in the markup or persistence format.
trans-unit.target: 静态控件添加到以声明方式中标记或持久性格式的页。

trans-unit.source: Because the declarative tags are permanently present in the markup, static controls can never be deleted, but they can be closed and reopened.
trans-unit.target: 声明性的标记是永久地存在于标记，因为静态控件永远不会被删除，但它们可以关闭并重新打开。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The first time the **Add Calendar** button is clicked, the code in the event handler creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, and adds it to a zone as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object.
trans-unit.target: 第一次**添加日历**单击按钮时，代码在事件处理程序创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制，并将其添加到作为区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>对象。

trans-unit.source: Because the control is added programmatically, it is a dynamic control, and therefore it can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 因为会以编程方式添加控件，它是动态控件，并因此可以删除。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the **Delete Calendar** button, the code ensures that the control exists, and then deletes it by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击**删除日历**按钮，该代码可确保控件存在，，且然后将其删除通过调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Represents the display mode used for changing the layout of Web pages that contain Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于更改包含 Web 部件控件的网页布局的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> field references a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object that is created and contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>字段引用自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>对象，创建并包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class without needing an instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 由于这是一个静态对象，你可以引用直接通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>而无需控件的实例的类。

trans-unit.source: When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode> (browse mode) by default.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Web 部件页在首次加载时，在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>（浏览模式） 默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: When users want to change the layout of the page by moving controls to different zones or within the current zones, they must first switch the page to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> (design mode).
trans-unit.target: 如果用户想要通过将控件移到不同的区域或在当前区域内更改页的布局，它们必须先切换到页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>（设计模式下）。

trans-unit.source: In design mode, the user interface (UI) for the various zones appears, and users can then drag controls to change the layout.
trans-unit.target: 在设计模式下，将显示各种区域的用户界面 (UI)，而且用户可以拖动控件来更改布局。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> field programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>字段以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes for the page, which in this case are browse and design.
trans-unit.target: 此代码填充页上，在这种情况下是浏览和设计的受支持的显示模式的下拉列表。

trans-unit.source: Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，，在`Page_PreRender`方法时，代码将检查是否当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>。

trans-unit.source: If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果是这样，`Label1`将是可见的如果不是，`Label1`将隐藏。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default.
trans-unit.target: 加载浏览器中后，您拥有默认情况下浏览模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the label on the page is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，隐藏页上的标签。

trans-unit.source: Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to design mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用下拉列表框控件将页切换到设计模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now visible.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于中的代码`Page_PreRender`方法，标签才现在可见。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that is to be disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 要断开连接的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control that is being closed or deleted from any connections it is participating in.
trans-unit.target: 移除要关闭或要从其所参与的连接中删除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 或服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> method is called internally by the Web Parts control set when a control is either closed on a page or deleted from a page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A>方法的 Web 部件控件集在页或从页中删除控件时由内部调用。

trans-unit.source: In such a scenario, the method is called to remove the control from any connections where it is involved as a consumer or provider.
trans-unit.target: 在此类方案中，方法被调用来删除该控件从任何连接其中包含作为使用者或提供程序。

trans-unit.source: If the control is removed from any connection, this method also calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method to end any connections in which `webPart` was involved.
trans-unit.target: 如果从任何连接删除控件，则此方法也会调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法来结束的任何连接`webPart`涉及。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> method is called, it raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A>方法调用，因此，它会发出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>事件。

trans-unit.source: Normally this event can be cancelled, but in two cases it cannot be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 通常，此事件可以被取消，但不是能取消两种情况下。

trans-unit.source: One case occurs during requests to the page, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ActivateConnections%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 页上，在请求期间发生的一种情况时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ActivateConnections%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict among existing connections, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> method will be invoked to close one of the conflicting connections, and in this instance the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event cannot be cancelled, because the conflict must be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果在现有的连接之间冲突<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A>方法将调用以关闭之一相互冲突的连接，并在这种情况<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>事件不能被取消，因为必须解决冲突。

trans-unit.source: The other case occurs when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control that is currently connected is either closed or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 另一种情况时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或关闭或删除当前连接的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: In this case, because of the control is being removed from the page, its connection needs to be terminated as well, therefore by design it is not possible to cancel the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event to interrupt the process of ending a connection.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，因的控件而正在从删除页上，其连接需要被终止，因此不能取消设计使然<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>事件中断的结束连接过程。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Using two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, the Web page enables you to create a connection between the controls by clicking a button, while another button enables you to disconnect the controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用两个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，Web 页使你可以通过单击按钮，另一个按钮使你能够断开的控件时控件之间创建连接。

trans-unit.source: If you close one of the controls while the page is in browse mode and the controls are connected, an override of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> method disconnects the closed control, ends the connection, and displays a message.
trans-unit.target: 如果该页是在浏览模式中，并且控件已连接时，会关闭每个控件的重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A>方法断开连接已关闭的控件，结束该连接，并显示一条消息。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control for changing display modes.
trans-unit.target: 用于更改显示模式用户控件。

trans-unit.source: A source file containing custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 包含自定义的源文件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: A Web page to host the controls.
trans-unit.target: 承载控件网页。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从示例部分中获取该用户控件的源代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类概述。

trans-unit.source: For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关显示模式和用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part is the file containing the source code for the two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that will be connected, and a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 第二部分是包含两个自定义的源代码的文件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>将连接的控件和自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: This example uses dynamic compilation, so the `Register` directive that references these components in the Web page is declared accordingly at the top of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用动态编译，因此`Register`相应地声明引用这些组件在网页中的指令在 Web 页的顶部。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates compiling options, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示编译选项的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: In the source code, notice the inherited control `MyWebPartManager` that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在源代码，请注意继承的控件`MyWebPartManager`可重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method checks each connection in a page to see whether the control being closed participates in the connection and, if so, calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method to end the connection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检查页来查看是否被关闭的控件参与连接并且，如果是这样，调用中的每个连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法来结束该连接。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the base implementation of the method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 这等同于中的方法的基实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: The overridden method then customizes the base implementation by writing a message to the page.
trans-unit.target: 重写的方法然后自定义的基实现，通过一条消息写入页。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。

trans-unit.source: Notice that near the top, it contains `Register` directives to register the user control, and the dynamically compiled assembly with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在靠近顶部，它包含`Register`指令用于注册用户控件，并具有动态编译的程序集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The page has two primary methods.
trans-unit.target: 页都有两种主要方法。

trans-unit.source: The `Button1_Click` method creates a connection between the controls, while the `Button2_Click` method disconnects the controls.
trans-unit.target: `Button1_Click`方法创建控件之间的连接时`Button2_Click`方法则断开控件。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page, click the **Connect** button to connect the controls.
trans-unit.target: 加载页面后，单击**连接**按钮以将控件连接。

trans-unit.source: Then click the verbs menu in one of the controls (the downward arrow in the header of the control), and select **Close** from the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 然后单击其中一个控件 （控件的标头中的向下箭头），谓词菜单并选择**关闭**从谓词菜单。

trans-unit.source: When you try to close the control, the overridden method is called, the connection is ended, and the message is written to the page.
trans-unit.target: 当你尝试关闭该控件时，重写的方法调用、 连接结束，和将消息写入到页。

trans-unit.source: If you want to reset the page to restore the closed control and experiment with other options, click the **Reset User State** link to remove personalization data and restore the page's original state.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要重置页后，可以还原已关闭的控件并尝试其他选项，请单击**重置用户状态**链接以移除个性化设置数据和还原页面的原始状态。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that represents the connection between server controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示服务器控件之间的连接的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: Carries out the process of disconnecting server controls that are connected on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 执行断开网页中连接的服务器控件的过程。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method carries out the complete process of ending a connection between <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server controls, when you pass it the `connection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法执行的结束之间的连接的整个过程<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或服务器控件，当你将其传递`connection`参数。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to disconnect controls when you place an `<asp:connectionszone>` element in a Web page, to provide a user interface (UI) for managing connections.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于断开控件，当你将放`<asp:connectionszone>`在网页上，用于提供用户界面 (UI) 管理连接的元素。

trans-unit.source: When a page is in connect display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>), and a current connection exists, users can click a button that calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method to end the connection.
trans-unit.target: 在一个页面时连接的显示模式 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>)，和当前的连接存在时，用户可以单击调用一个按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法来结束该连接。

trans-unit.source: You can also call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method directly from your code, if you want to disconnect controls programmatically and without having to add an `<asp:connectionszone>` element to a page.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法直接从代码中，如果你想要以编程方式，而不必添加断开控件`<asp:connectionszone>`到页元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Using two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, the Web page enables you to create a connection between the controls by clicking a button, while another button enables you to disconnect the controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用两个自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，Web 页使你可以通过单击按钮，另一个按钮使你能够断开的控件时控件之间创建连接。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control for changing display modes.
trans-unit.target: 用于更改显示模式用户控件。

trans-unit.source: A source file containing custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 包含自定义的源文件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: A Web page to host the controls.
trans-unit.target: 承载控件网页。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第一部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从示例部分中获取该用户控件的源代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类概述。

trans-unit.source: For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关显示模式和用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part is a file containing the source code for the two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that will be connected.
trans-unit.target: 第二部分是包含两个自定义的源代码的文件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>将连接的控件。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。

trans-unit.source: This example uses dynamic compilation, so the `Register` directive that references these components in the Web page is declared accordingly at the top of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用动态编译，因此`Register`相应地声明引用这些组件在网页中的指令在 Web 页的顶部。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates compiling options, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示编译选项的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。

trans-unit.source: Notice that near the top, it contains `Register` directives to register the user control and the dynamically compiled assembly with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在靠近顶部，它包含`Register`指令用于注册用户控件并具有动态编译的程序集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: The page has two primary methods.
trans-unit.target: 页都有两种主要方法。

trans-unit.source: The `Button1_Click` method creates a connection between the controls, and the `Button2_Click` method disconnects the controls.
trans-unit.target: `Button1_Click`方法创建控件之间的连接和`Button2_Click`方法则断开控件。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page, you can click the **Connect** button to connect the controls.
trans-unit.target: 加载页面后，你可以单击**连接**按钮以将控件连接。

trans-unit.source: If you enter some text in the text box control, and then click the **Enter** button, the text will be displayed in the connected control (it would not be displayed if the controls were disconnected).
trans-unit.target: 如果在文本框控件中，输入一些文本，然后单击**Enter**按钮，将连接 （它不会显示如果控件已断开连接） 的控件中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: If you click the **Disconnect** button, the controls will be disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击**断开连接**按钮，控件将断开连接。

trans-unit.source: You can verify the connection status of the controls by using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into **Connect** mode.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用验证控件的连接状态**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以将页切换到**连接**模式。

trans-unit.source: After doing that, click the verbs menu (represented by an arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and select the **Connect** item.
trans-unit.target: 之后，这样，在每个控件的标题栏中单击 （由箭头表示） 的谓词菜单，然后选择**连接**项。

trans-unit.source: The connection UI is displayed; it is available because there is an `<asp:connectionszone>` element declared in the page.
trans-unit.target: 连接用户界面会显示出来;它是可用的因为没有`<asp:connectionszone>`页面中声明的元素。

trans-unit.source: You can also connect and disconnect the controls from this UI.
trans-unit.target: 你可以连接和断开此 UI 控件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="connection" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="connection" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="connection" /> is not contained in either <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections" /> or <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="connection" /> 未包含在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="connection" /> has already been disconnected from <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="connection" /> 已从 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections" /> 断开。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="connection" /> has already been disconnected from <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="connection" /> 已从 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections" /> 断开。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection)" /> method if you want to change the default implementation for disconnecting <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection)" />方法如果你想要更改断开连接的默认实现<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控件。

trans-unit.source: If you do override the method, and you simply want to add some implementation to the existing method, you can call the base method prior to executing your own code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写方法，并且你只想要将某些实现添加到现有的方法，你可以调用基方法，然后执行你自己的代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the active display mode for a Web page that contains Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含 Web 部件控件的网页的活动显示模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> that determines a page's display mode.
trans-unit.target: 确定页显示模式的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" />。

trans-unit.source: A page that contains Web Parts controls is always in one of several possible display modes.
trans-unit.target: 页面，其中包含 Web 部件控件始终是几个可能的显示模式之一中。

trans-unit.source: For details about display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4).
trans-unit.target: 有关显示模式的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件页显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class creates the display modes for a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类创建网页上的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Using the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control creates several standard display mode objects that can be used on pages that contain Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用的基本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>类，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件创建可以用在包含 Web 部件控件的页的多个标准显示模式对象。

trans-unit.source: These standard display modes are described in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 这些标准的显示模式进行了介绍<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control also manages the display modes for pages that use Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件还管理使用 Web 部件控件的页面的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control keeps a reference to the current display mode on a page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件在页上保留对当前显示模式的引用。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A> property to switch a page into different display modes.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A>属性以将页切换到不同的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: For an example of changing display modes on a page that uses Web Parts controls, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 更改使用 Web 部件控件的页面上的显示模式的示例，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: As part of managing the display mode, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control also provides events and event handlers relating to display modes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanged%2A> method and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为管理显示模式中，一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件还提供事件和事件处理程序与相关显示模式，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanged%2A>方法和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods provide a mechanism for customizing a page's behavior, and even for adding a custom display mode.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法提供了一种机制自定义页面的行为，以及甚至对于添加的自定义显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: After loading the page in a browser, you can use the buttons near the bottom of the page to switch display modes.
trans-unit.target: 在加载浏览器中之后, 可以使用页面底部附近的按钮切换显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The page is in browse mode by default when it loads.
trans-unit.target: 加载时，该页已于默认情况下浏览模式。

trans-unit.source: If you switch to design mode, you can drag the server controls from one zone to another, or arrange two controls within one zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果你切换到设计模式，可以将服务器控件从一个区域中拖动到另一个字符串，或排列在一个区域中的两个控件。

trans-unit.source: If you switch to edit mode, you can click the verbs menu in the header of either of the server controls, select **Edit**, and edit the control using the provided editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 如果你切换到编辑模式，你可以单击任何一个服务器控件，选择的标头中的谓词菜单**编辑**，和编辑使用提供的编辑用户界面 (UI) 的控件。

trans-unit.source: Switching among display modes in a Web Parts application is very common, and you might want to provide a consistent, reusable way to do this on all your pages that contain Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 部件应用程序中的显示模式之间切换是很常见，并且你可能想要提供一致的可重用方式来执行此操作在所有页，其中包含 Web 部件控件上。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a user control that changes display modes and that can be reused on many pages, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 有关在很多页上，可以重用更改显示模式和用户控件的示例，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> object being assigned to the property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 赋给该属性的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> 对象为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> object being assigned to the property is not one of the supported display modes.
trans-unit.target: 赋给该属性的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> 对象不是受支持的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> object being assigned to the property is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 赋给该属性的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> 对象已禁用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the current display mode on a Web Parts page has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当 Web 部件页上的当前显示模式更改之后发生。

trans-unit.source: Display modes are an integral part of Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: 显示模式是 Web 部件应用程序不可或缺的组成部分。

trans-unit.source: When users switch to a different display mode on a Web page, the page will often take on a very different appearance, depending on the purpose of the new display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当用户切换到不同的显示模式在网页上时，页通常会采用非常不同的外观，具体取决于新的显示模式的目的。

trans-unit.source: After a display mode has changed, you might want to make certain changes in the user interface (UI), such as hiding or showing certain controls, changing the appearance of selected UI elements, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 显示模式已更改后，你可能想要进行某些更改在用户界面 (UI)，如隐藏或显示某些控件中，更改所选的 UI 元素的外观，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: For more information on display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4).
trans-unit.target: 显示模式的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件页显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a user clicks a verb on a Web page that begins the process of changing to a different display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击网页上的谓词以启动不同显示模式之间的更改过程之后发生。

trans-unit.source: Display modes are an integral part of Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: 显示模式是 Web 部件应用程序不可或缺的组成部分。

trans-unit.source: When users switch to a different display mode on a Web page, the page will often take on a very different appearance, depending on the purpose of the new display mode.
trans-unit.target: 当用户切换到不同的显示模式在网页上时，页通常会采用非常不同的外观，具体取决于新的显示模式的目的。

trans-unit.source: After a user initiates the process of changing to a new display mode by clicking a verb, you might want to make certain changes in the user interface (UI) by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs.NewDisplayMode%2A> property to determine what the new display mode will be, and then changing various UI elements accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 用户启动的过程将更改为新的显示模式，通过单击谓词后，你可能想要通过使用用户界面 (UI) 中进行某些更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs.NewDisplayMode%2A>属性来确定新的显示模式将是什么，，然后将更改各种 UI元素相应地。

trans-unit.source: A useful way to do this is to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A> method to customize the UI.
trans-unit.target: 有用的方式来执行此操作是重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A>方法以自定义 UI。

trans-unit.source: For more information on display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4).
trans-unit.target: 显示模式的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件页显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of all display modes that are associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件关联的所有显示模式的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection" /> that contains the set of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection" />，包含一组 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> 控件关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A> property references all associated display modes, in contrast with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> property, which references only the display modes that are available (supported) on the current page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A>属性引用所有关联显示模式，这与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>属性，即在引用有 （上受支持） 的当前页的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: Two of the provided display modes, browse and design, are always supported on a page.
trans-unit.target: 两个提供的显示模式、 浏览和设计，始终支持在页面上。

trans-unit.source: The other three display modes, edit, catalog, and connections, are supported only when a page has the corresponding type of zone necessary for a particular display mode to work.
trans-unit.target: 其他三个显示模式、 编辑、 目录和连接，支持仅当页具有相应的特定显示模式工作所需的区域类型时。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you page does not contain an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone, the edit display mode would appear in the collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A> property, but would not appear in the collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你的页面不包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>区域，编辑显示模式将显示在所引用的集合中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A>属性，但不是会显示所引用的集合中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了以编程方式利用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The code uses this property to populate the list with all the display modes available in the Web Parts control set, even those that are not supported on the current page.
trans-unit.target: 代码使用此属性来填充该列表与所有 Web 部件控件集内可用的显示模式，甚至是那些不支持在当前页。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the catalog and connect display modes are not supported, because their corresponding required zones are not on the page.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，该目录并连接的显示模式不受支持，因为所需的相应区域不在页面上。

trans-unit.source: The other three display modes--browse, design, and edit--are supported on the page.
trans-unit.target: 其他三个显示模式--浏览、 设计和编辑--支持的页上。

trans-unit.source: Edit mode is supported because the page contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone, while browse and design modes are always supported.
trans-unit.target: 编辑支持模式，因为页包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>区域，而浏览和设计模式始终受支持。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, you can use the drop-down list control to switch the page from browse mode to design mode, and then to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 加载浏览器中后，你可以使用下拉列表控件切换到设计模式，来自浏览模式的页，然后编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: In edit mode, you can click the drop-down verbs menu in the header of one of the server controls, and select **Edit** to edit the control.
trans-unit.target: 在编辑模式下，你可以单击每个服务器控件的标头中的下拉列表谓词菜单并选择**编辑**编辑该控件。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you select **Catalog** or **Connect** in the drop-down list, an error page is generated.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果你选择**目录**或**连接**在下拉列表中，生成一个错误页。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all dynamic connections that currently exist on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取网页上当前存在的所有动态连接的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection" /> that contains references to all dynamic connections on a page.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection" />，其中包含对页上所有动态连接的引用。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic connections are connections that are created programmatically, as opposed to statically.
trans-unit.target: 动态连接都是以编程方式，而不是静态创建的连接。

trans-unit.source: Static connections are created by declaring them in the markup of a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 静态连接创建的 Web 窗体页的标记中声明它们。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic connections are formed either programmatically, or by a user creating a connection using the connection user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 通过编程方式，或一个用户创建了使用连接用户界面 (UI) 的连接形成动态连接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections%2A> collection, though it is read-only and you cannot change its contents, does provide programmatic access to each dynamic connection object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections%2A>集合，但它是只读的无法更改其内容，提供以编程方式访问每个动态连接对象。

trans-unit.source: To perform common operations such as connecting or disconnecting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, developers should use the public methods on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>, rather than trying to directly modify connection objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 执行常见的操作，如连接或断开<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，开发人员应使用的公共方法上,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>，而不是尝试直接修改连接中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Represents the display mode in which end users can edit and modify server controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示最终用户可在其中编辑和修改服务器控件的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> field references a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object that is created and contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>字段引用自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>对象，创建并包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class without needing an instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 由于这是一个静态对象，你可以引用直接通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>而无需控件的实例的类。

trans-unit.source: When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode> (browse mode) by default.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Web 部件页在首次加载时，在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>（浏览模式） 默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: When users want to edit or modify a server control, they must first switch the page to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> (edit mode).
trans-unit.target: 如果用户想要编辑或修改服务器控件，则首先必须切换到页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>（编辑模式）。

trans-unit.source: Second, they must select a specific server control to edit, by clicking the edit verb on the verbs menu in that control's header.
trans-unit.target: 其次，它们必须选择要编辑，请通过单击该控件的标头中的谓词菜单上的编辑谓词的特定服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: After the control is in edit mode, the editing user interface (UI) appears for editing the selected control.
trans-unit.target: 控件处于编辑模式后，编辑的用户界面 (UI) 将显示用于编辑所选的控件。

trans-unit.source: To enable edit mode on a page, the page must contain at least one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone that includes one or more of the provided editing controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, or custom editing controls.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用页面上的编辑模式，该页必须包含至少一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>区域包含一个或多个所提供的编辑控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控件或自定义编辑控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> field programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>字段以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes for the page, which in this case are browse, design, and edit.
trans-unit.target: 此代码填充页上，在这种情况下是浏览、 设计和编辑的受支持的显示模式的下拉列表。

trans-unit.source: To support editing, an `<asp:EditorZone>` element is in the page.
trans-unit.target: 若要支持编辑，`<asp:EditorZone>`元素是在页中。

trans-unit.source: Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，，在`Page_PreRender`方法时，代码将检查是否当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>。

trans-unit.source: If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果是这样，`Label1`将是可见的如果不是，`Label1`将隐藏。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default.
trans-unit.target: 加载浏览器中后，您拥有默认情况下浏览模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice the label on the page is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 请注意页面上的标签将被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用下拉列表框控件将页切换到编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now visible.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于中的代码`Page_PreRender`方法，标签才现在可见。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Edit** verb in the verbs menu on one of the controls, to enable editing of that specific control.
trans-unit.target: 单击**编辑**在每个控件，若要启用特定控件的编辑谓词菜单中的谓词。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether client-side scripting is enabled on the Web page that contains a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件的网页上是否启用了客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether client script can run on the page.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示页上是否可以运行客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableClientScript%2A> property provides a way for developers to disable client scripts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableClientScript%2A>属性提供一种方法供开发人员用于禁用客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: You might want to disable client scripting for security purposes, or to ensure that all users of a page will have a similar user experience, even if they use different browsers.
trans-unit.target: 你可能需要禁用客户端脚本出于安全目的，或者以确保页面的所有用户将都具有类似的用户体验，即使它们使用不同的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: You can disable client scripting by adding an `EnableClientScript` attribute to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element on a Web page, as in the following line of declarative code:
trans-unit.target: 你可以禁用客户端脚本通过添加`EnableClientScript`属性设为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>元素在网页上，如下所示的声明性代码的以下行：

trans-unit.source: Also, developers could eliminate this property by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class and setting the default value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，开发人员可以消除此属性，通过继承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类和设置默认值为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set uses client scripting to provide some of the client user interface (UI) and personalization features.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件集使用客户端脚本以提供一些客户端用户界面 (UI) 和个性化功能。

trans-unit.source: If you disable client scripting, Web Parts controls still work, but some features are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用客户端脚本，Web 部件控件仍起作用，但某些功能将被禁用。

trans-unit.source: The ability to drag controls into different zones is disabled, along with the ability to render verbs in a drop-down verbs menu in a control's title bar (the verbs are instead displayed as links in the control's title bar).
trans-unit.target: 禁用了将控件拖动到不同区域的功能，以及能够呈现 （谓词改为显示为控件的标题栏中的链接） 的控件的标题栏中的下拉列表谓词菜单中的谓词。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating that the use of themes is enabled on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示网页启用了主题。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether themes are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示是否启用了主题。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> property to ensure that it always returns a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件重写基<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>属性以确保它始终返回值为`true`。

trans-unit.source: This is done because the Web Parts control set requires the use of themes to render the Web Parts controls that are child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control and that form the user interface (UI) of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为 Web 部件控件集要求使用主题来进行呈现 Web 部件控件的子控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制的和窗体中的网页上的用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: For example, themes are used to render the various zones, and the controls that reside in the zones, including the various types of part controls (controls that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> class), user controls, ASP.NET server controls, and custom server controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，主题用于呈现各种区域，并驻留在区域，其中包括各种类型的控件部件控件 (继承的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>类)，用户控件、 ASP.NET 服务器控件和自定义服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Although the overridden <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A> property is implemented as a read/write property in accordance with its base property, you cannot set the property, because by design it must always return a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 尽管重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A>属性实现为读/写属性，根据其基属性，因为设计使然，它始终必须返回的值，你不能设置此属性， `true`。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set the property, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置属性，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the property value.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置该属性值。

trans-unit.source: Completes the process of connecting a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to another control.
trans-unit.target: 完成将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件连接到另一个控件的过程。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartConnecting%2A> method finishes the process of connecting a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to another control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartConnecting%2A>方法完成连接的过程<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>到另一个控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: It is the counterpart to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它是对应于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartConnecting%2A> method ensures that the personalization object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property is modifiable, which is necessary because forming a connection is itself a type of personalization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartConnecting%2A>方法可以确保个性化设置对象引用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>属性是可修改，这是必要的因为建立连接本身是一种类型的个性化设置。

trans-unit.source: The method then ensures that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> object is not `null`, and finally calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该方法确保，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>对象不是`null`，最后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The control referenced by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart" /> 属性所引用的控件为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Developers who need to extend the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control might want to override this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员需要扩展<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />控件可能希望重写此方法在派生类。

trans-unit.source: One approach would be to call the base method and then add some additional custom handling, or you might want to completely customize the entire process of completing a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: 一种方法是调用基方法，然后添加一些附加的自定义处理，或者你可能想要完全自定义完成控件之间的连接的整个过程。

trans-unit.source: Completes the process of editing a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 完成编辑 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件的过程。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing%2A> method finishes the process of editing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing%2A>方法完成编辑过程<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。

trans-unit.source: It is the counterpart to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它是对应于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A>方法。
